blog.name: thekingoforzammar
blog.title: Haven From Calamity
blog.description:
https://www.patreon.com/OnGloriousWings

“By ourselves we’re no one. It’s when other people look at us and see someone… that’s the moment we each start to exist.” -- Joshua (TWEWY) in KH3D.

"If you dwell in the dust, then wake up and sing" -- The Bravery, Song for Jacob

"As long as I live and there's blood in my arms, this is a day that is brighter then bombs." -- The Bravery, Song for Jacob

Pretty much the entirety of the song The Spectator.

"I'm not who I seem, who you thought I could be, the support you can lean up against when you need. I'm the dark when you want the lights out, at all costs. This is mine, that is yours, I'm the bricks in your wall." -- Coheed and Cambria, Evagria the Faithful

I'm an avid gamer, a lover of history, a lover of ancient politics (hate modern politics, because everyon'es pretty much an idiot in the political arena). Feel free to ask me whatever's on your mind.

Proud Child of the Fence and feminist-in-training. Possibly doing badly on that last part, but I always welcome discussion and education.

tags: I realize this is a years old ep
but I just started like a month or two back
summary: When you get to the moment in Critical Role where they get a massive White Dragon as a gift at the end of Trial of the Take... ...
body:
When you get to the moment in Critical Role where they get a massive White Dragon as a gift at the end of Trial of the Take… 

….

……and you are left with the consuming feeling of “DO WANT”

reblog.comment:
When you get to the moment in Critical Role where they get a massive White Dragon as a gift at the end of Trial of the Take… 

….

……and you are left with the consuming feeling of “DO WANT”

trail.content_raw:

….

……and you are left with the consuming feeling of “DO WANT”
trail.content:
When you get to the moment in Critical Role where they get a massive White Dragon as a gift at the end of Trial of the Take… 

….

……and you are left with the consuming feeling of “DO WANT”

body:
CRIT ROLE LIVE

Hey there critters! So in the scramble to get 2 VIP tickets for me and my SO, I accidentally bought a single, non-VIP ticket as well.

I’d love to have that extra ~ $110 back, so I’m selling it. How does one do this appropriately? I have the physical ticket, so I’m not quite sure how to handle this and guarantee a safe and friendly transaction.

Accept half before mailing it and half after?

Get full amount then send?

(most uncomfortable situation) meet in person and exchange ticket for cash near venue?

Please advise, and also, who needs a ticket??!

reblog.comment:
CRIT ROLE LIVE

(most uncomfortable situation) meet in person and exchange ticket for cash near venue?

Please advise, and also, who needs a ticket??!

trail.content:

Hey there critters! So in the scramble to get 2 VIP tickets for me and my SO, I accidentally bought a single, non-VIP ticket as well.

Get full amount then send?

(most uncomfortable situation) meet in person and exchange ticket for cash near venue?

Please advise, and also, who needs a ticket??!

tags: afterlife disco molly is a Healing concept
summary: post-mollymauk sadbrain: *thinks about molly waking up in a grave again, completely alone, and having no idea who he is or...
body:
post-mollymauk sadbrain: *thinks about molly waking up in a grave again, completely alone, and having no idea who he is or what's happening, reading the note on his jacket and wanting to remember the name on it or who the 'mighty nein' are but not being able to* 
post-mollymauk gladbrain: *thinks about molly flipping beau off from the ethereal plane, spiriting down to earth to whistle his favorite annoying tunes while caleb and fjord are trying to sleep, making bets with his new afterlife buddies on which of the m9 is gonna get the killing blow on whatever they're fighting at the time, having a grand ol time wherever he is*

summary: Do you know what people are referring to when they say Matt's had a rough couple of months? :(
question: Do you know what people are referring to when they say Matt's had a rough couple of months? :(
answer:
I’m not entirely sure, but most likely it is about some the ways some viewers acted towards Matt after Molly’s death. 

@cr-cheer-squad? Any further clarification?

reblog.comment:

@cr-cheer-squad? Any further clarification?

trail.content_raw:

trail.content:

tags: *griffin voice* its not one of those things
summary:
Magnus, sliding over a drink: "So you like eating magical rocks? Tell me about it."
Fjord: "Who the fuck are you and how did you...
body:
Magnus, sliding over a drink: “So you like eating magical rocks? Tell me about it.”

Fjord: “Who the fuck are you and how did you get into my room?”

Lup, popping up from under the bed: “No, no, I wanna know about your weapon eating habits!”

reblog.comment:
Magnus, sliding over a drink: “So you like eating magical rocks? Tell me about it.”

Fjord: “Who the fuck are you and how did you get into my room?”

Lup, popping up from under the bed: “No, no, I wanna know about your weapon eating habits!”

trail.content_raw:

Fjord: “Who the fuck are you and how did you get into my room?”

Lup, popping up from under the bed: “No, no, I wanna know about your weapon eating habits!”
trail.content:
Magnus, sliding over a drink: “So you like eating magical rocks? Tell me about it.”

Fjord: “Who the fuck are you and how did you get into my room?”

Lup, popping up from under the bed: “No, no, I wanna know about your weapon eating habits!”

tags: i know it’s coming and i’m Terrified
summary: sam in episode 26: hey, y’all don’t happen to have like, healing potions or anything? in case one of us goes...
body:
sam in episode 26: hey, y’all don’t happen to have like, healing potions or anything? in case one of us goes unconscious?

everyone: has one (1) common healing potion between the five of them

[image description: a gif of an older, pale-complexioned woman against a grey background. She’s smiling as she says, “Honey, you’ve got a big storm comin’.” The smile doesn’t reach her eyes. /end description]

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

blog.name: thedicepaladin
blog.title: Throw Me In Dice Jail
blog.description: She/Her pronouns - 21yo lesbian from Cali *~*~*~* Welcome to my blog! I created this blog for Dice as my collection grows and grows! I also wanted somewhere to put all my dnd stuff. So feel free to submit stuff and ask questions! I love talking to people about some good ole Dungeons and Dragons! (((If you're looking to do a Dice Palette Request, they're only open when my submission box is open, thanks~~~)))
